æ‰¾åˆ°pythonå®‰è£…è·¯å¾„ï¼Œæ‰“å¼€ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡-ç³»ç»Ÿå˜é‡ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©pathï¼Œé€‰æ‹©æ–°å»ºï¼ŒæŠŠpython scriptæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹è·¯å¾„å¤åˆ¶è¿›å»å³å¯ã€‚

å®åœ¨æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰å®‰è£…å¯ä»¥åˆ°è¿™é‡Œå®‰è£…ä¸‹è½½pipï¼šhttps://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installation/#

å„è‡ªåº“çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ï¼š
requestsï¼šè·å–ç½‘é¡µæ•°æ®
BeautifulSoupï¼šç½‘é¡µè§£æ
xlwtï¼šè¿›è¡Œexcelæ“ä½œ

è¿™æ ·ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥å°±ç®—å®Œæˆäº†ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šæ–°å»ºhello.pyï¼Œè¾“å…¥ä»£ç ï¼š

# -*- coding = utf-8 -*-# @Time : 2022/4/27 8:21# @Author :ç‹æ•¬åš# @File : test.py# @Software: PyCharmfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup  #ç½‘é¡µè§£æimport re    #æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ–‡å­—åŒ¹é…import urllib.request,urllib.error  #æŒ‡å®šurlï¼Œè·å–ç½‘é¡µæ•°æ®import xlwt  #è¿›è¡Œexcelæ“ä½œimport sqlite3  #è¿›è¡ŒSQLiteæ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œimport pymysql.cursors  #è¿æ¥mysqlæ•°æ®åº“
def main():
    baseurl = â€œhttps://www.cnblogs.com/wjingbo/default.html?page=â€œ
    datalist = getData(baseurl)         #è°ƒç ”åˆ†ææ•°æ®å‡½æ•°
    #1 çˆ¬å–ç½‘é¡µ
    savepath = â€œ.\æƒã€‚çš„åšå®¢ä¿¡æ¯.xlsâ€     #excelä¿å­˜çš„ä½ç½®åç§° #æ³¨æ„ï¼šï¼è¿™é‡Œçš„åå­—å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚iuniko.xls
    saveData(datalist,savepath)          #è°ƒç”¨ä¿å­˜å‡½æ•°
def askURL(url):
    head = {   #ä¼ªè£…è¯·æ±‚å¤´ï¼Œæ¨¡æ‹Ÿæµè§ˆå™¨è®¿é—®
       â€œUser-Agentâ€:â€ Mozilla / 5.0(Linux;Android6.0;Nexus5 Build / MRA58N) AppleWebKit / 537.36(KHTML, likeGecko) Chrome / 99.0.4844.51Mobile Safari / 537.36â€
    }
    request = urllib.request.Request(url,headers=head)
    html = â€œâ€
    try:
        response = urllib.request.urlopen(request)
        html = response.read().decode(â€˜utf-8â€™)
        #print(html)
    except urllib.error.URLError as e:
        if hasattr(e,â€codeâ€):
            print(e.code)
        if hasattr(e,â€reasonâ€):
            print(e.reason)
    return html  #è¿”å›çˆ¬åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰çš„htmlæ•°æ®
#æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ§åˆ¶è·å–è¯¦ç»†å†…å®¹
findTitle = re.compile(râ€™<span>(.?)</span>â€™,re.S)
findlink = re.compile(râ€™<a class=â€postTitle2 vertical-middleâ€ href=â€(.?)â€>â€™)
findzhaiyao = re.compile(râ€™<div class=â€c_b_p_descâ€(.?)<aâ€™,re.S)
#æ³¨æ„äº†ï¼è¿™é‡Œæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå‘ï¼ŒåŸä½œè€…æ²¡æœ‰æ ‡è®°å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä¸‹é¢è¿™ä¸ªæƒå­—ä½ å¾—æ¢æˆä½ çš„åšå®¢çš„åå­—ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æˆ‘åšå®¢åå­—å«å“å‘¦ä½ å¯æ£’æ£’äº†ï¼Œé‚£å°±å¡«è¿™ä¸ªåå­—è¿›å»ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼šlist index out of range
finddate = re.compile(râ€™<div class=â€postDescâ€>posted @(.?)æƒâ€™,re.S)
findread = re.compile(râ€™<span class=â€post-view-countâ€ data-post-id=(.?)</span>â€™)
findcomment = re.compile(râ€™<span class=â€post-comment-countâ€ data-post-id=(.?)</span>â€™)
finddigg = re.compile(râ€™<span class=â€post-digg-countâ€ data-post-id=(.*?)</span>â€™)
def getData(baseurl):
    datalist = []  # 2 è§£ææ•°æ®
    allTitle = []  #å­˜å‚¨æ ‡é¢˜
    allLink = []   #å­˜å‚¨é“¾æ¥
    allZhaiyao = [] #å­˜å‚¨æ‘˜è¦
    alldate = []    #å­˜å‚¨æ—¥æœŸ
    allRead = []    #å­˜å‚¨é˜…è¯»æ•°
    allComment = [] #å­˜å‚¨è¯„è®ºæ•°
    allDigg = []    #å­˜å‚¨æ¨èæ•° # æ³¨æ„ï¼š45ä»£è¡¨çˆ¬å–45é¡µï¼Œæˆ‘çš„å…¬å¼€çš„éšç¬”æ•°é‡æ˜¯440ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘è¦å†™æˆ45ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ä¼šçˆ¬å–450æ¡æ•°æ®
    for i in range(0,10):
        url = baseurl + str(i+1)    #å¯¹ç›®æ ‡é“¾æ¥åœ°å€page=åé¢çš„æ•°å­—è¿›è¡Œå¾ªç¯
        html = askURL(url)          #è°ƒç”¨çˆ¬å–çš„å‡½æ•°
        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, â€œhtml.parserâ€)
    </span><span style="color: #0000ff;">for</span> item <span style="color: #0000ff;">in</span> soup.find_all('div',class_="day"<span style="color: #000000;">):  #ç®€å•è¿‡æ»¤ä¿¡æ¯        #print(item)        item </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> str(item)        title </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(findTitle,item)     #åŒ¹é…æ•°æ®        allTitle.extend(title)      #æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®åˆ°åˆ—è¡¨        link </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(findlink,item)        allLink.extend(link)        zhaiyao </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(findzhaiyao,item)        allZhaiyao.extend(zhaiyao)        date </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(finddate,item)        alldate.extend(date)        readNum </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(findread,item)        allRead.extend(readNum)        commentNum </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(findcomment,item)        allComment.extend(commentNum)        diggNum </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> re.findall(finddigg,item)        allDigg.extend(diggNum)#print(allTitle)#print(allLink)#print(allZhaiyao)#print(alldate)#print(allRead)#print(allComment)#print(allDigg)</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">for</span> j <span style="color: #0000ff;">in</span> range(0,100<span style="color: #000000;">):     #å¾ªç¯10é¡µå°±æ˜¯100æ¡æ•°æ®ï¼Œ45é¡µå°±æ˜¯450æ¡æ•°æ® #è¿™ä¸ªå¾ªç¯æ˜¯è¿‡æ»¤æ‰æ‰€æœ‰ä¸éœ€è¦çš„ä¿¡æ¯    data </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> []    title </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> allTitle[j].strip()     #å»é™¤å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é‡Œçš„ç©ºæ ¼    data.append(title)    link </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> allLink[j]    data.append(link)    zhaiyao </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> allZhaiyao[j].strip()    zhaiyao </span>= zhaiyao.split('">')[1<span style="color: #000000;">]    data.append(zhaiyao.replace(</span>"\n",""<span style="color: #000000;">))    date </span>=<span style="color: #000000;"> alldate[j].strip()    data.append(date)    readNum </span>= allRead[j].split('>')[1<span style="color: #000000;">]      #é€šè¿‡åˆ†å‰²å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ¥å»é™¤æ— ç”¨ä¿¡æ¯    data.append(readNum)    commentNum </span>= allComment[j].split('>')[1<span style="color: #000000;">]    data.append(commentNum)    diggNum </span>= allDigg[j].split('>')[1<span style="color: #000000;">]    data.append(diggNum)    datalist.append(data)print(datalist)</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">return</span><span style="color: #000000;"> datalist     #è¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨
def saveData(datalist,savepath):
    print(â€œsaveâ€¦â€)
    book = xlwt.Workbook(encoding=â€utf-8â€,style_compression=0)
    sheet = book.add_sheet(â€˜åšå®¢å›­éšç¬”åˆ—è¡¨â€™,cell_overwrite_ok=True)    #åˆ›å»ºsheet1
    col = (â€œæ ‡é¢˜â€,â€åŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥â€,â€æ‘˜è¦â€,â€æ—¶é—´â€,â€é˜…è¯»â€,â€è¯„è®ºâ€,â€æ¨èâ€)        #åŠ æ ‡é¢˜
    for i in range(0,7):
        sheet.write(0,i,col[i])
    for i in range(0,100):          #æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®åˆ°excel*ï¼ˆ100æ¡ï¼‰
        print(â€œç¬¬%dæ¡â€%(i+1))        #æ‰“å°æ¡æ•°
        data = datalist[i]
        for j in range(0,7):
            sheet.write(i+1,j,data[j])      #æ·»åŠ æ¯ä¸ªå­åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­çš„7ä¸ªæ•°æ®
    book.save(savepath)            #ä¿å­˜excel
if name == â€œmainâ€œ:
    main()
    print(â€œçˆ¬å–å®Œæ¯•ï¼â€)
